about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Your Real Estate Partner
about.bio: With over 10 years of experience in the Bay Area real estate market, I've helped hundreds of families find their dream homes. My approach combines deep local knowledge with a commitment to exceptional service. Whether you're buying your first home or selling a luxury property, I'm here to guide you through every step of the process.

specialties.description: Deep knowledge of Bay Area neighborhoods, schools, and market trends

services.subtitle: What I Do
services.title: My Services
services.description: Comprehensive real estate services tailored to your needs

items.title: Buyer Representation
items.description: I'll guide you through every step of finding and purchasing your dream home, from initial search to closing. Expert negotiation and market knowledge ensure you get the best deal.

items.title: Seller Representation
items.description: Get top dollar for your property with my proven marketing strategies, professional photography, staging consultation, and expert negotiation skills.

items.title: Market Analysis
items.description: Comprehensive comparative market analysis (CMA) to help you make informed decisions about pricing, whether you're buying or selling a property.

items.title: Investment Consulting
items.description: Expert advice on real estate investments, rental properties, and building wealth through strategic property acquisition and management.

items.name: Jennifer & Mike Thompson
items.text: Sarah made our home buying experience seamless. Her knowledge of the local market was invaluable, and she negotiated a great deal for us. We couldn't be happier!

items.name: Robert Chen
items.text: Working with Sarah to sell our home was fantastic. She handled everything professionally, from staging to closing. We sold above asking price in just 10 days!

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.text: As a first-time homebuyer, I was nervous about the process. Sarah was patient, informative, and always available to answer my questions. Highly recommend!

items.name: David & Lisa Kim
items.text: Sarah's expertise in luxury properties is unmatched. She understood our needs perfectly and found us our dream estate. True professional!

items.name: Amanda Foster
items.text: Sarah's market knowledge and negotiation skills saved us $150K on our purchase. She's our real estate agent for life!

items.name: James Wilson
items.text: I've worked with several agents over the years, but Sarah stands out. Her dedication and communication are exceptional.

contact.subtitle: Get In Touch

contact.description: Ready to buy or sell? I'm here to help you every step of the way.
